definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_dies</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityPlayer</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_check_creature_type"><field name="type">UNDEAD</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">a zombie</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_ischild"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:Killachild</field><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Not a zombie</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
